language.accessDeniedMessage: The player trial has expired or is otherwise not allowed to run on this domain
language.stationError: The station is down, please try again later...
language.popupBlocked: Unable to open the large player window.. please disable any pop-up blockers on your browser
language.requiredFields: All fields are required! Please make sure every field in the form is correctly entered
language.mailSent: Comment sent successfully! Thank you for your feedback
language.mailError: An error occurred while sending the email, please try again later...
language.playTip: Connect to the current station and start playback
language.stopTip: Stop playback and disconnect from the current station
language.popupTip: Open full featured player on a separate window
